A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was sooooo much wrong with this movie. Ugh!!! Space Leia?!?! Yoda was jacked up and had a Jim Henson Muppet feel. You mean to tell me they have a mountain base with a huge metal door that is impenetrable but wait we did not notice the hole in the back of the cave we could escape from until some ice foxes show us the way?!?!?! Rey's parents you say? Absolutely disappointed that they are nobodies.
